Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍は今、クレアという ヒューマの娘を探している。 協力するように。
Entry.EnglishText: The army is currently searching for a girl named Claire. Please cooperate with us on our search.

Entry.JapaneseText: 治安が悪くなっているのは このベルサスだけではないが、 それにしてもここはひどすぎる……
Entry.EnglishText: Public order isn't just deteriorating here in Belsas, however this town is in a far worse state compared to others.

Entry.JapaneseText: 単なる遠鳴りだ。 しばらくすれば収まる。 むやみに騒ぎ立てないように。
Entry.EnglishText: Those distant roars... Please remain inside and don't cause any trouble...

Entry.JapaneseText: 街に入ろうとするバイラスは 何があっても阻止する！ 広場へ避難するんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Veiruses are entering the city! We'll stop them no matter what, so please evacuate to the square!

Entry.JapaneseText: この街は我々カレギア軍の 監視下にある。
Entry.EnglishText: This town is under the Callegean Army's surveillance.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはヒューマの地区よ。 ガジュマは橋の向こうへ 行きなさいよね。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the Huma district. You Gajuma belong on the other side of the bridge.

Entry.JapaneseText: よくガジュマとなんて 一緒にいられるわね。 それともそのガジュマ、 あなたたちの召使い？
Entry.EnglishText: You've got some guts bringing Gajuma along with you. Or perhaps he's your servant?

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと、こんなところで ガジュマが何してるの！ まさか、泥棒じゃないでしょうね！
Entry.EnglishText: What are you doing here, Gajuma!? Don't tell me you're a thief!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマは橋の向こうへ 行きなさいよね！ シッシッ！
Entry.EnglishText: Go beyond the bridge, Gajuma! Shoo! Shoo!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……私、ガジュマと話すのって 好きじゃないの……
Entry.EnglishText: I... do not like talking to the likes of Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: スカラベ様は立派な方よ。 邪魔なガジュマたちを、街から 追い出してくれたんですもの。
Entry.EnglishText: Lord Scarabe is a splendid person. After all, he managed to chase away those vulgar Gajuma from town.

Entry.JapaneseText: スカラベ様は、一人娘のスージーを さらわれた事があるの…… それを命じたのは女王様なんですって……
Entry.EnglishText: Lord Scarabe's only daughter, Susie was kidnapped and, hear this, apparently the Queen herself ordered her kidnapping!

Entry.JapaneseText: その事があって、スカラベ様は ますますガジュマ嫌いになったん ですって
Entry.EnglishText: Because of that, Lord Scarabe just grew to detest those Gajuma even more!

Entry.JapaneseText: さっきのガジュマたちといい、 あなたといい……どうして、 今日はこんなにガジュマが 街をウロウロしてるの！
Entry.EnglishText: First it was those Gajuma, then it was you... Why are there such a lot of litter around town today!?
Entry.Notes: deepL is giving me something different, but idk how exactly to write it. will need further breakdown for the sake of accuracy.

Entry.JapaneseText: さっき、ガジュマたちが スカラベ様のお屋敷の方へ行ったわ。 何をするつもりかしら……？
Entry.EnglishText: Some Gajuma went to Lord Scarabe's mansion earlier. I wonder what happened...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あっちへ行って。 ガジュマの顔も見たくないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Go somewhere else... I don't want to see your ugly furry mug.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……スカラベ様とガジュマが 明日、話し合いをするんですってね。 無事に終わればいいけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Apparently Lord Scarabe will hear out those Gajuma tomorrow. I hope nothing bad happens...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……スカラベ様は……悪くない。 元はと言えば、スージーを さらった女王様が…… いけないのよ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Lord Scarabe... didn't do anything wrong...! It was the Queen's fault in the first place... I can't accept this!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わ、私……わからない…… 女王様が言ってた事……
Entry.EnglishText: I-I don't know... The Queen said that...
Entry.Notes: maybe it's more like "I don't understand," instead?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマはヒューマで ガジュマはガジュマ…… 心にだって種族はあると思う……
Entry.EnglishText: Huma are Huma and Gajuma are Gajuma... I think race exist in the heart...

Entry.JapaneseText: ね、ねえ……ガジュマも、 ヒューマと同じように 悲しんだり喜んだり…… する……わよね？
Entry.EnglishText: H-Hey... Do Gajuma... Also feel grief and happiness like we Huma do...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 私……ずっと考えてるの…… ヒューマとガジュマの違いって 何なのかなって……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been thinking lately... What makes Huma and Gajuma different from each other?

Entry.JapaneseText: 同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>なら…… 同じように笑ったり、 泣いたりするのよね……
Entry.EnglishText: If they're both <Yellow>people<White> then, they must both laugh and cry too...

Entry.JapaneseText: 見た目が違うだけで…… やっぱり、心は同じ…… なのかな……
Entry.EnglishText: Despite how different they look from each other... Maybe it's true that they both have similar hearts.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ご、ごめんなさい。 今、ガジュマと話す気分に なれないの……
Entry.EnglishText: A-Apologies, I'm not in a mood to talk to Gajuma at the moment.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ジルバ様の演説以来…… ガジュマたちの様子が変なの……
Entry.EnglishText: The Gajuma have grown strange ever since Lady Zilva gave her speech...

Entry.JapaneseText: 少しだけ、ガジュマの事、 考えられるようになったのに…… やっぱり同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>として 暮らすなんて……無理よ……
Entry.EnglishText: Even though I've began to think of Gajuma... Will coexistence as <Yellow>people<White> ever be possible...?

Entry.JapaneseText: よくわからないの…… ヒューマとガジュマは 違うって思ってきたし……
Entry.EnglishText: I-I don't know... I-I've began to think that Gajuma and Huma are both different...
Entry.Notes: including this one because the previous dialogue is clunky

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、その違いが何なのか 考えても、答は出ないの…… どうしてかな……
Entry.EnglishText: ...but no matter how hard I think, I can never come to an answer on how they're different...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの顔は 見たくもない……！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't want to see your face, Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: スカラベ様は 偉大な方なのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Lord Scarabe is a magnificent individual.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっとガジュマ嫌いが極端だけど、 それくらいの事は大した事ではないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: He might hate Gajuma to an extreme, but that doesn't really matter.
